name: North Road Encounters
description: Random encounters for the road North of Greyhaven

results.text: Highwaymen ambush (minor, opportunity for negotiation or combat).
Traveling merchant caravan passes; potential trade or rumors.
A wounded traveler needs assistance.
Forest animal attack (wolves, dire wolves).
Harper agent observes suspicious activity.
Bandit scouting party sighted ahead.
Caravan horses spooked by strange noise.
Abandoned campsite shows signs of a fight.
Traveling bard offers news or rumors.
Orc scouts spotted nearby.
Strange magical phenomenon observed (minor).
Lost traveler or child needs help finding road.
Fallen tree blocks part of the road; climb or clear.
Small group of bandits demands toll.
Merchant hides contraband (Zhentarim), adventurers notice.
Militia patrol passes heading north.
Strange tracks (undead or Blight creatures) spotted.
Sudden rainstorm makes travel difficult.
Lost pack animal wanders onto road.
Rival adventuring party crosses paths.
